articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Super Typhoon Yagi kills four in Vietnam after casualties in China and Philippines - NBC News
articles.description: Asia’s most powerful storm this year made landfall in northern Vietnam on Saturday, the meteorological agency said, killing at least four people after tearing through China’s island of Hainan and the Philippines.
